meta.disclaimer: openFDA is a beta research project and not for clinical use. While we make every effort to ensure that data is accurate, you should assume all results are unvalidated.

results.reason_for_recall: Michigan Dept. of Agriculture collected a sample of Sabra Hummus that came up positive for L. Monocytogenes.  Baltimore District is  working with VDACS to investigate.
results.distribution_pattern: The product was distributed nationwide.
results.product_description:
Sabra Classic Hummus, 17oz Six Pack UPC 040822017497 / 301290
Sabra Dipping Co. LLC, White Plains, NY
results.initial_firm_notification: Two or more of the following: Email, Fax, Letter, Press Release, Telephone, Visit

results.reason_for_recall: Some Pregestimil 20 Calorie Nursette Bottles from batch EV5A6F were inadvertently packaged in Pregestimil 24 Calorie Nursette cartons. The individual Nursette bottles are correctly labeled as 20 Calorie. The  carton  is the cardboard sleeve wrapped around 6 bottles, the bottle labels and the outer corrugated case all correctly state 20 calorie.

results.reason_for_recall: Appetite for Healthy Living (DBA Purely Elizabeth) is recalling Cranberry Cashew Ancient Grain Muesli because an ingredient in this cereal contains sulfur dioxide, which is not declared on the label/ingredient statement.

results.reason_for_recall: Waymouth Farms is recalling Raw Pine Nuts because they have the potential to be contaminated with Salmonella.

results.product_description:
Raw Pine Nuts sold in the following brands and package sizes:  
-Good Sense  3 oz. (85g) bag  UPC 30243-86681,  
-Good Sense 4 oz. (113g) bag, UPC 30243-86680,  
-Good Sense 4 oz. (113g) tub UPC 30243-50799,  
-Good Sense 15 oz. (425g) bag UPC 30243-86687,  
-Good Sense 5 lbs. box UPC 30243-02860, 
-Good Sense 4 oz. bags may have been sold as a floor display, UPC 30243 86683 ,  and  
-Weis 4 oz. (113g) tub UPC 30243-72557
